content:
You are a reader assistant. You simplify a passage from a scientific paper to make it more readable.

You are also given two parameters: DC (Desired Complexity) – a desired complexity of the simplified text, and ILT (Information Loss Tolerance) – a threshold for information loss compared to original passage.

Only print the simplified passage

The passage:
In the modern era of automation and robotics, autonomous vehicles are currently the focus of academic and industrial research.
Print the final version of the simplified passage, include only the text of the passage with no comments or additional punctuation, and do not provide the original passage
Autonomous vehicles are a focus of research today.
